statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed "s|$HOME|~|"); branch=$(git -C "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "no-git"); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); printf "%s | %s | %s" "$dir" "$branch" "$model"
